identity.name: My Dammaiguda
identity.theme_strategy: Light Mode Default (High Contrast for Accessibility)

typography.rules: Headings must use Manrope. Body text uses Inter. All Telugu content must use Noto Sans Telugu. Ensure 4.5:1 contrast ratio for all text.

primary.description: Deep Teal - Represents Health, Environment, and Stability. Use for primary buttons, active states, and key branding.

secondary.description: Terracotta - Represents Urgency, Action, and Earth. Use for 'Report Issue' buttons, alerts, and call-to-actions.

layout.grid_strategy: Mobile-first single column (grid-cols-1). Tablet 2 columns. Desktop 3-4 columns.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 h-12 rounded-full px-8 font-medium shadow-md transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/90 h-12 rounded-full px-8 font-medium shadow-sm transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.outline: border-2 border-primary text-primary hover:bg-primary/10 h-12 rounded-full px-8 font-medium transition-all

cards.base: bg-white rounded-xl border border-border/50 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-shadow p-5

inputs.base: h-12 rounded-lg border-input bg-background px-3 py-2 text-base ring-offset-background file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-primary focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

accessibility.contrast: Ensure all text has at least 4.5:1 contrast ratio against background.
accessibility.touch_targets: All interactive elements must be at least 48x48px.
accessibility.focus_states: Visible focus rings (ring-2 ring-primary) for keyboard navigation.
accessibility.screen_readers: Use semantic HTML and aria-labels for icon-only buttons.

assets.icons: Use Lucide React icons. For specific civic icons not in Lucide, use Phosphor Icons.

auth.style: Clean, centered card. Phone number input with large country code. OTP input with distinct boxes.
auth.image: Use 'hero_clean_street' as a subtle background with overlay.

dashboard.layout: Bento Grid style. Key metrics at top. Quick actions (Report Issue) prominent.
dashboard.widgets: Health Risk Card (Air Quality), Issue Status Tracker, Daily Steps.

issue_reporting.style: Step-by-step wizard. Large category icons. Map integration prominent.

kaizer_fit.style: Energetic but clean. Progress rings for steps. Leaderboard list.
kaizer_fit.colors: Use Teal and Emerald gradients for health metrics.

instructions_to_main_agent.general: Build a mobile-first PWA. Prioritize speed and accessibility. Use the defined color palette strictly. Do not use political colors (Saffron, Bright Green, etc.).
instructions_to_main_agent.language: Implement a global language toggle (English/Telugu). Ensure layout handles Telugu text expansion gracefully.
instructions_to_main_agent.components: Customize Shadcn components to match the 'rounded-xl' and 'h-12' (large touch target) rules. Do not use default sharp corners.
instructions_to_main_agent.testing: Add data-testid to all interactive elements.

do_not: Do not use gradients for text.
Do not make touch targets smaller than 44px.
Do not use low contrast gray text.
do: Ensure all images have alt text.
Use skeleton loaders for data fetching states.
